headline: CRSP vs. BEAM: Which Gene Editing Stock Holds More Potential Right Now?
summary: CRISPR Therapeutics gains momentum with Casgevy sales and a broader pipeline, while Beam Therapeutics advances base-editing therapies still in early stages.
